title: The Accidental Wedding
description: After an accident, a dashing rogue awakens in a country cottage, where he is being nursed back to health by one innocent beauty and five not-so-innocent orphaned children...When Nash Renfrew wakes in the bed of lovely Maddy Woodford, he thinks he's dreaming. Then he learns of his accident and the loss of his memory. But when it returns, Nash has no desire to leave Maddy's side and he pretends he still has amnesia. With each passing day, Nash's attraction to Maddy grows. But he's a diplomat and she's just a country girl. How can he even entertain thoughts of seducing her?With five orphaned half siblings in her charge, Maddy needs the money Nash offers and accepts it even though she, knows his stay will stir gossip. She can't deny his presence makes her feel safe. Nor can she deny the passion promised with each soft caress. But their love is also igniting a danger neither of them realizes -- and a threat to a newfound love. neither Maddy nor Nash can live without...
author: Anne Gracie
